mapper.sql: i.id, i.feeID, i.typeID, i.enterpriseName, i.professionID, i.date, i.createBy, i.createTime, i.updateBy, i.updateTime, i.version, i.isDeleted,i.status

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and i.feeID = #{condition.feeID} and i.typeID = #{condition.typeID} and i.enterpriseName = #{condition.enterpriseName} and i.professionID = #{condition.professionID} and i.date = #{condition.date} and i.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and i.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and i.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and i.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and i.version = #{condition.version} and i.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and i.status = #{condition.status}

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(i.feeID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.feeID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.typeID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.typeID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.enterpriseName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.enterpriseName}),'%')) and UPPER(i.professionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.professionID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.date) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.date}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(i.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(i.status) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.status}),'%'))
mapper.update: update insrecord set feeID=#{feeID}, typeID=#{typeID}, enterpriseName=#{enterpriseName}, professionID=#{professionID}, date=#{date}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, status=#{status}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from insrecord i where i.id = #{id} and i.isDeleted = false
mapper.sql: i.id as 'id', i.version as 'version',i.feeID as 'feeID',i.typeID as 'typeID',i.enterpriseName as 'enterpriseName',i.professionID as 'professionID',i.date as 'date',i.status as 'status', insProfessionType.id as 'insProfessionType.id', insProfessionType.version as 'insProfessionType.version',insProfessionType.code as 'insProfessionType.code',insProfessionType.name as 'insProfessionType.name',insProfessionType.risk as 'insProfessionType.risk',insProfessionType.professionID as 'insProfessionType.professionID', insFee.id as 'insFee.id', insFee.version as 'insFee.version',insFee.type as 'insFee.type',insFee.fee as 'insFee.fee',insFee.insuredAmount as 'insFee.insuredAmount', insRecordPersonList.id as 'insRecordPersonList.id', insRecordPersonList.version as 'insRecordPersonList.version',insRecordPersonList.recordID as 'insRecordPersonList.recordID',insRecordPersonList.professionID as 'insRecordPersonList.professionID',insRecordPersonList.personID as 'insRecordPersonList.personID', insPerson.id as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.id', insProfessionTypeOther.id as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.id', insProfessionTypeOther.version as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.version',insProfessionTypeOther.code as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.code',insProfessionTypeOther.name as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.name',insProfessionTypeOther.risk as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.risk',insProfessionTypeOther.professionID as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionTypeOther.professionID', insPerson.id as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.id', insPerson.version as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.version',insPerson.name as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.name',insPerson.sex as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.sex',insPerson.cardID as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.cardID'
mapper.select: select from insrecord i left join insprofessiontype insProfessionType on i.professionID = insProfessionType.id left join insfee insFee on i.feeID = insFee.id left join insrecordperson insRecordPersonList on i.id = insRecordPersonList.recordID left join insprofessiontype insProfessionTypeOther on insRecordPersonList.professionID = insProfessionTypeOther.id left join insperson insPerson on insRecordPersonList.personID = insPerson.id ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: i.id as 'id', i.version as 'version',i.feeID as 'feeID',i.typeID as 'typeID',i.enterpriseName as 'enterpriseName',i.professionID as 'professionID',i.date as 'date',i.status as 'status', insProfessionType.id as 'insProfessionType.id', insProfessionType.version as 'insProfessionType.version',insProfessionType.code as 'insProfessionType.code',insProfessionType.name as 'insProfessionType.name',insProfessionType.risk as 'insProfessionType.risk',insProfessionType.professionID as 'insProfessionType.professionID', insFee.id as 'insFee.id', insFee.version as 'insFee.version',insFee.type as 'insFee.type',insFee.fee as 'insFee.fee',insFee.insuredAmount as 'insFee.insuredAmount', insType.id as 'insType.id', insType.version as 'insType.version',insType.name as 'insType.name',insType.description as 'insType.description',i.updateTime as 'updateTime'
mapper.select: select ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM insrecordperson WHERE insrecordperson.`recordID` = i.id) AS 'count' from insrecord i left join insprofessiontype insProfessionType on i.professionID = insProfessionType.id left join insfee insFee on i.feeID = insFee.id left join instype insType on i.typeID = insType.id order by i.updateTime desc ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: i.id as 'id', i.version as 'version',i.feeID as 'feeID',i.typeID as 'typeID',i.enterpriseName as 'enterpriseName',i.professionID as 'professionID',i.date as 'date',i.status as 'status', insProfessionTypeRecord.id as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.id', insProfessionTypeRecord.version as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.version',insProfessionTypeRecord.code as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.code',insProfessionTypeRecord.name as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.name',insProfessionTypeRecord.risk as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.risk',insProfessionTypeRecord.professionID as 'insProfessionTypeRecord.professionID', insFee.id as 'insFee.id', insFee.version as 'insFee.version',insFee.type as 'insFee.type',insFee.fee as 'insFee.fee',insFee.insuredAmount as 'insFee.insuredAmount', insRecordPersonList.id as 'insRecordPersonList.id', insRecordPersonList.version as 'insRecordPersonList.version',insRecordPersonList.recordID as 'insRecordPersonList.recordID',insRecordPersonList.professionID as 'insRecordPersonList.professionID',insRecordPersonList.personID as 'insRecordPersonList.personID', insProfessionType.id as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.id', insProfessionType.version as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.version',insProfessionType.code as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.code',insProfessionType.name as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.name',insProfessionType.risk as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.risk',insProfessionType.professionID as 'insRecordPersonList.insProfessionType.professionID', insPerson.id as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.id', insPerson.version as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.version',insPerson.name as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.name',insPerson.sex as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.sex',insPerson.cardID as 'insRecordPersonList.insPerson.cardID', insType.id as 'insType.id', insType.version as 'insType.version',insType.name as 'insType.name',insType.description as 'insType.description',i.updateTime as 'updateTime'
mapper.select: select ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM insrecordperson WHERE insrecordperson.`recordID` = i.id) AS 'count' from insrecord i left join insprofessiontype insProfessionTypeRecord on i.professionID = insProfessionTypeRecord.id left join insfee insFee on i.feeID = insFee.id left join insrecordperson insRecordPersonList on i.id = insRecordPersonList.recordID left join insprofessiontype insProfessionType on insRecordPersonList.professionID = insProfessionType.id left join insperson insPerson on insRecordPersonList.personID = insPerson.id left join instype insType on i.typeID = insType.id ${orderByClause}

select ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM insrecordperson WHERE insrecordperson.`recordID` = i.id) AS 'count' from insrecord i left join insprofessiontype insProfessionTypeRecord on i.professionID = insProfessionTypeRecord.id left join insfee insFee on i.feeID = insFee.id left join insrecordperson insRecordPersonList on i.id = insRecordPersonList.recordID left join insprofessiontype insProfessionType on insRecordPersonList.professionID = insProfessionType.id left join insperson insPerson on insRecordPersonList.personID = insPerson.id left join instype insType on i.typeID = insType.id where insperson.cardID = #{condition.cardID} and i.status = 1
